name: Chaos Kingdom (itch) (SirBoy)
description:
Rough Work in Progress

Made during Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 with the theme "an end is a new beginning". This is a rogue-lite bullet hell action game where your demise is only the beginning of the journey.

Use WASD to move and the mouse to shoot. Defeat enemies and pick up gold to spend and grow stronger after you inevitably die. How far will you get?
